name: The Great Filter (TheWorldSquid)
description:
Game made for Ludum Dare 50, Theme "Delay the Inevitable"

Click on your ships (the bottom 3 to start) to use them.  Hover over objects to get a description of what they do.

You must move a ship first before taking an action (sorry, ran out of time!).  After a ship is moved, if things are in range, you can select any usable item.  Mine planets for health (XP wasn't implemented fully) - and attack/move around your enemies, all while staying out of reach of the black hole!  But the longer you survive, the stronger its pull!
